blogPost.excerpt: Add image annotation capabilities to your web apps: - 10 marker types - move, resize, and rotate - change colors and styles - inline or popup - customizable UI - save and recall state - mouse, touch, or pen - full TypeScript support - extendable
blogPost.body: Add image annotation capabilities to your web apps: - 10 marker types - move, resize, and rotate - change colors and styles - inline or popup - customizable UI - save and recall state - mouse, touch, or pen - full TypeScript support - extendable
blogPost.title: marker.js 2 - Add image annotation features to your web apps
blogPost.author: Alan Mendelevich

localize.description: 为您的Web应用程序添加图像批注功能：-10种标记类型-移动、调整大小和旋转-更改颜色和样式-内联或弹出-可自定义UI-保存和调用状态-鼠标、触摸或满笔打印支持-可扩展
localize.tagline: 向您的Web应用程序添加图像注记功能

localize.description: 爲您的Web應用程序添加圖像批註功能：-10種標記類型-移動、調整大小和旋轉-更改顏色和樣式-內聯或彈出-可自定義UI-保存和調用狀態-鼠標、觸摸或滿筆打印支持-可擴展
localize.tagline: 向您的Web應用程序添加圖像註記功能

next.excerpt: LogSpace is an automated invoicing system backed by time and expense tracking. It's suited for freelancers that send invoices as well as teams that need to track time.

localize.description: LogSpace是一个以时间和费用跟踪为后盾的自动开票系统。它适合发送发票的自由职业者以及需要跟踪时间的团队。
localize.tagline: 在线时间跟踪、费用和开票

localize.description: LogSpace是一個以時間和費用跟蹤爲後盾的自動開票系統。它適合發送發票的自由職業者以及需要跟蹤時間的團隊。
localize.tagline: 在線時間跟蹤、費用和開票
